document_data.name: Gaerradh
document_data.mainbody: '''Gaerradh''' was an [[elf]] [[ranger]] and scout in the [[High Forest]]
document_data.Description: Gaerradh had long russet hair tied back in a single braid.
document_data.Possessions: The ranger carried a [[bow]] and two curved [[axe]]s.
document_data.Activities: The elf was responsible for keeping watch over the northern marches of the wood.
document_data.Relationships: Gaerradh's companion was [[Sheeril]], a large and powerful wolf. By [[1479 DR]], Gaerradh was married to [[Methrammar Aerasumé]], High Marshal of the [[Argent Legion]] of [[Luruar]].
